ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectBourgeois, The Hon. Cindy A., RELOCATION EXPENSES
PrecisOrder prescribing additional periods during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. CINDY A. BOURGEOIS, who was required to relocate to the City of Sidney, Nova Scotia, following her appointment as a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia on June 19, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
